title: Authorised human medicines with new active substances
author: © Copyright Swissmedic
cleaned_text: Several documents are only available in German or French. That is the reason why you find the following texts in the original language. Thanks for your comprehension. Archive of communications published in the Swissmedic Journal regarding the authorisation of medicinal products with new active pharmaceutical ingredients. The archive is structured in chronological order and contains information both on medicinal products that are still authorised and on those for which the authorisation has since expired. All information correct as at the date of authorisation, up-to-date information on authorised medicinal products can be found at
